attributes.action: Make Pagan/Druid handfastings legal in England and Wales
attributes.additional_details: Pagan and Druid weddings or handfastings are not currently recognised as a form of a legal marriage ceremony in England and Wales.  Other faiths have their marriages recognised by law and it is only fair that the same rights are given to pagans and druids to be able to have their union blessed under the ways and rituals of thier own beliefs .
